actions-list.actionItem: Pursuant to the order of Friday, June 20, 2025,  the Journal of the proceedings of the Senate was deemed approved to date.
Pursuant to the order of Friday, June 20, 2025, the morning hour being deemed expired, and the times for the recognition of the two leaders being reserved.
The following transactions of morning business occurred on today.

PN26-50:
        Daniel Zimmerman, of North Carolina, to be an Assistant Secretary of Defense

        -- By unanimous consent agreement, mandatory quorum required under Rule XXII waived.

        -- Cloture invoked in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 58 - 33. Record Vote Number: 322 


        -- Considered by Senate.

        -- By unanimous consent agreement, debate and vote 6/24/2025.
By unanimous consent, on the request of Mr. Moreno, at  6:55 p.m., the Senate adjourned, under its order of today, until  2:15 p.m. tomorrow.
